meanings.definition: An exclamation of encouragement or excitement.
meanings.sent3: Heigh! Let's go on an adventure!
meanings.sent5: Heigh! Feel the energy and enthusiasm!

meanings.sent1: The mountain's heigh was covered in snow.
meanings.sent2: The heigh of the tree reached the sky.
meanings.sent3: The heigh of the roller coaster made my stomach drop.
meanings.sent4: The heigh of success is different for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The heigh of the mountain was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: To rise to a great height.
meanings.sent1: Planes heigh into the sky before flying.
meanings.sent2: Birds heigh gracefully above the trees.
meanings.sent3: I heighed on my tiptoes to see over the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The sun heighed over the horizon, bringing light.
meanings.sent5: The rocket heighed into space, leaving a trail behind.
